text: "Help!" is a 1965 song by The Beatles and is taken from their fifth studio album Help!. It was used in the 1965 movie of the same name. It topped the single charts in Australia, Canada, Ireland, the Netherlands, New Zealand, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, the United Kingdom and the United States. It was covered by Bananarama in 1989. == References == Category:1965 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:John Farnham songs Category:Tina Turner songs Category:Bananarama songs Category:The Carpenters songs Category:Roxette songs Category:Deep Purple songs Category:Folk songs Category:Rock songs
title: Help! (song)
